Trade/Device Name(s): G5 Infinity Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Regulation Name(s): Blood Glucose Test System, Glucose Oxidase
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for G5 Infinity Blood Glucose Monitoring System using electrochemical technology for glucose measurement in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood as an aid in monitoring diabetes management in home and clinical settings; for in vitro diagnostic use with testing sites including fingertip and alternate locations; not for screening or diagnosis of diabetes or use with neonates
